title: Peru to get UPI: NIPL ties up with Peru’s Central Bank
description:
NPCI International Payments Limited (NIPL) and the Central Reserve Bank of Peru (BCRP) announced a partnership to deploy a UPI-like payments system in Peru, the payments corporation said in a press statement. NIPL ties up with Central Bank of Peru for UPI-like payment system in Peru (ANI)

This make...
